name: Fisnik Canaj
summary: Frontend developer with 8+ years in Angular and modern web for gaming, commerce, and enterprise. Led Solution25’s Angular squad for Volvo’s four-month release while shipping high-impact features for CSGORoll, Hypedrop, and Celonis.
about: Most recently I’ve focused on high-traffic gaming platforms at Ancient Gaming, rebuilding key flows for CSGORoll in Angular and launching Hypedrop’s admin journeys with Qwik, GraphQL, and Builder.io. At Solution25 I led a distributed squad to extend Volvo’s online car sales experience and stabilise Service Plan with systematic testing and upgrades. I enjoy tackling complex UI programmes—whether producing process-mining interfaces at Celonis, running Gazeta Demos as a WordPress news portal, or prototyping StadHubs in React Native to explore community sport scheduling.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Working across Angular 20, GraphQL, Apollo Client/Studio, NgRx, and RxJS to keep high-traffic wagering flows reliable.
Led CSGORoll’s migration from Angular 16 to 18, clearing the path for the Angular 20 rollout and stabilising build tooling.
Built real-time favourites, wishlist, and probability tooling that boosts engagement while maintaining performance budgets.
Partnered with design and analytics to iterate on UI polish and experiment tracking across desktop and mobile.

Hypedrop – Delivered admin authentication, multi-step account journeys, data-rich dashboard pages, and reusable UI components with filters for management tables in Qwik, GraphQL, Builder.io, and Tailwind CSS.

experience.title: Frontend/Angular Developer
bullets: Led Volvo’s online car sales squad for a four-month release window, mentoring interns and shipping regional flows on Angular + NX.
Cartouche Club – implemented Nuxt SSR on Shopware for SEO gains, refreshed styling, and launched faceted search and coupon deep-link journeys.
Service Plan – added paginated data tables backed by Node.js, MongoDB, and Mongoose, generated partner-specific PDF reports, and expanded dashboards with new pages and plugins.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Shipped UX improvements and mobile optimisations across marketing pages.
Built reusable Vue.js components with Sass, Webpack, and Laravel integrations.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Delivered an Angular booking application with lazy loading and modular routing.
Built complex reservation forms for E-Dea and integrated with backend APIs.
Crafted SPA patterns that balanced performance and maintainability.

experience.title: Frontend UI Developer
bullets: Built UI components, filtering interfaces, and chart visualisations for the process mining platform.
Worked across Angular, Sass, and vanilla JavaScript to improve usability.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Completed an internship project using HTML, CSS/Bootstrap, and PHP to improve civic data access.

experience.title: UI Developer
bullets: Enhanced UI design execution with JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Self-taught through React, Vue, Angular, and Python projects, focusing on clean front-end builds.
Delivered portfolios for clients while sharpening algorithm and data-structure fundamentals.

projects.name: CSGORoll
projects.desc: Migrated Angular 16→18 on the path to 20, overhauled high-volume betting forms, and delivered real-time favourites, wishlist, and probability tooling using Angular, NgRx, RxJS, and GraphQL/Apollo Studio.

projects.name: Hypedrop
projects.desc: Built the admin dashboard foundation—modernising login/logout, implementing password reset, and shipping new pages, modals, and reusable UI widgets such as date-time pickers across Qwik + Angular 16–20 with GraphQL, Builder.io, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Cartouche Club
projects.desc: Enabled Nuxt SSR across the storefront for SEO, refreshed styling with Flowbite UI, implemented product search filters, and added deep-linkable coupon flows via Shopware APIs.

projects.name: Service Plan
projects.desc: Extended dashboards with paginated data tables, Node.js + MongoDB reports, and partner-specific PDF exports backed by Mongoose.

projects.name: Avodaq
projects.desc: Delivered data tables with advanced filtering for the platform, built atop Python/Django with Tailwind styling, and added Cypress end-to-end coverage during the Solution25 engagement.

projects.name: Hoook
projects.desc: Built the Hoook storefront in Vue.js with Vuex state management, crafting responsive product flows and launch content.

projects.name: StadHubs
projects.desc: Prototyped a community sports app with dashboard analytics, interactive charts, and polished login/register flows using React Native and MUI components.

projects.name: Gadgetlend
projects.desc: Refreshed UI and shipped multilingual support across the app.

projects.name: Gazeta Demos
projects.desc: Launched news portal with custom WordPress deployment.

projects.name: UNE Site Builder
projects.desc: Enhanced UNE’s site builder by adding new forms, improving editor UX, and wiring Vue.js components into the Laravel backend during the agency engagement.

projects.name: Mark-ing
projects.desc: Early-career WordPress build with custom CSS theming for the Mark-ing marketing site.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: Legacy personal portfolio built with handcrafted HTML/CSS and jQuery animations, showcasing several early-career mini projects.

projects.name: Celonis
projects.desc: Built and modernised Angular 8 UI components for Celonis’ process-mining platform and marketing site, contributing roughly 60% of the component library before the redesign.

projects.name: Volvo Cars
projects.desc: Led the Angular squad through a four-month release window, launching regional online car sales journeys with NX-driven tooling.

projects.name: E-Dea
projects.desc: Complex reservation forms and tables for route management UI.
